entry.title: Making the Most of Windows
entry.summary: Registry Edits I make these changes to my Windows registry to modify a few aspects of the OS. The first edit, EnableHexNumpad, allows me to use ALT + +#### to input Unicode values instead of just the default alt codes. The second change, DisableSearchBoxSuggestions, prevents the Windows search bar from web searching. Computer └ HKEY_CURRENT_USER ├ Control Panel │ └ Input Method │ ► ST...

entry.title: Reverse Engineering the PWP Format
entry.summary: I created this document while working with my Smith Corona PWP 78 DS, a ‘Personal Word Processor’ typewriter capable of reading and writing files to a floppy drive. It uses a proprietary .pwp format to encode files so I wanted to understand it so I could create new documents with an external computer. This is what I was able to discover. Header Format ?? ?? 20 20:20 20 20 20|20 20 20 20:2...
